testcase.name: Milestone Animation message for Subscriber User (Automated | Chrome, Safari, Firefox)
testcase.summary: Verify the Animation when user fills the 50% and 75% of the puzzle square.
testcase.preconditions:
• Appears only on daily puzzles (no minis or midis) and on all full-size puzzles
  • Does not depend on the backend, so it should appear even without an internet connection
  • This works on Desktop only for now!
  • Animation will not appear for Windows 7: IE 11(forNow)

step.expectedresults: Gamehub page should be displayed.

step.actions: Click on Login button present at the top right corner.
step.expectedresults: User should be successfully redirected to the login screen
Values should get filled in respective field
User should be successfully redirected to the Gamehub page
User should be redirected to Puzzle Play screen.

step.actions: Click on 'Ok' button present on the Modal.
step.expectedresults: Modal should be dismissed and Puzzle should be displayed.
Velaue should get enter in the selected square.
On completion of 50% 'Halfway' animation should be displayed.
Value of next 5 to 7 squares should be erased.

step.actions: Enter the value in the square and reach to 50% mark.
step.expectedresults: 'HalfWay' animation should be reappear.
"3/4 Done!" animation should be trigger.
Option dropdown should be displayed.

step.actions: Click on 'Puzzle' option present in Clear dropdown.
step.expectedresults: Only Puzzle should get clear.
Word should get clear.
'Halfway!' animation should be appear.

step.actions: Clear the word where "3/4 Done!" animation appears.
step.expectedresults: Word should get clear.
Word should get revealed and "3/4 Done!" animation should be displayed.
User should be successfully redirected to the Archive page
User should be redirected to the Game Play page
Puzzle setting screen should be displayed
'Show Puzzle Milestone' should be unchecked.
Puzzle play page should be displayed.
'Halfway Done!' animation should not appear.

testcase.name: Milestone Animation message for Anonymous User (Partially Automated)
testcase.summary: Verify the Animation when user fills the 50% and 75% of the puzzle square.
testcase.preconditions:
• Appears only on daily puzzles (no minis or midis) and on all full-size puzzles
  • Does not depend on the backend, so it should appear even without an internet connection
  • This works on Desktop only for now!
  • Animation will not appear for Windows 7: IE 11(forNow)

step.expectedresults: Gamehub page should be displayed.

step.actions: Scroll down to 'Free From Our Archive' and click on any puzzle.
step.expectedresults: User should be redirected to Puzzle Play screen.

step.actions: Click on 'Ok' button present on the Modal.
step.expectedresults: Modal should be dismissed and Puzzle should be displayed.
Value should get enter in the selected square.
On completion of 50% 'Halfway' animation should be displayed.
Value of next 5 to 7 squares should be erased.

step.actions: Enter the value in the square and reach to 50% mark.
step.expectedresults: 'HalfWay' animation should be reappear.
"3/4 Done!" animation should be trigger.
Option dropdown should be displayed.

step.actions: Click on 'Puzzle' option present in Clear dropdown.
step.expectedresults: Only Puzzle should get clear.
Word should get clear.
'Halfway!' animation should be appear.

step.actions: Clear the word where "3/4 Done!" animation appears.
step.expectedresults: Word should get clear.
Word should get revealed and "3/4 Done!" animation should be displayed.

testcase.name: Milestone Animation Message for Offline User (Partially Automated)

step.actions: Go to www.stg.nytimes.com/crossword as a home delivery admin user with no progress
step.expectedresults: The Game Hub page loads as expected and verify that the Daily and Mini Puzzle do not have any progress
Daily Puzzle page loads and puzzle has no progress
Modal disappears and gameplay content area becomes active
Page reloads and snowflake icon has changed to mustache icon

Dropdown expands, listing the following options:

  • Square
  • Word
  • 49.9%
  • 74.9%
  • 99.9%
  • Puzzle
One word less than half of the puzzle squares are filled correctly.
Milestones 50% animation appears

testcase.name: Milestone Animation not appear for Mini Puzzle
testcase.summary: Verify the Milestone Animation should not appear on solving Mini Puzzle
testcase.preconditions: • XWD subscriber should be logged in

step.expectedresults: User should be redirected to the Mini puzzle play page
Values should be entered in respective squares.
'Halfway Done!' animation should not appear

step.actions: Continue filling the puzzle and complete 76% of puzzle.
step.expectedresults: '3/4 Done!!' animation should not appear.

testsuite.name: Vertical Streaks
testsuite.details:
verify the vertical streaks formed by solving the Daily puzzle in a row.

 

  • Vertical Streak Epic 
  • Figma Designs
  • Streak PDF
  • Confluence Link

testcase.name: Vertical Streak when Current Streak and Days in a row are 0
testcase.summary:
Verify the streak message on the game hub page after solving today's daily with gold when Current Streak and Days in a row are zero

Story ticket Jira link: https://jira.nyt.net/browse/XWD-7448
testcase.preconditions:
• User should be on XWD page
  • Subscriber user with 0 Current Streak and 0 Days in a Row should be logged in

step.expectedresults: User should be redirected to Puzzle Play page

step.actions: Solve the puzzle without using any cheat
step.expectedresults: Congratulations modal with Gold Star should appear

step.actions: Verify the messages on the Congratulations modal
step.expectedresults:
Following messages should be displayed:

  • Congrats!
    •   you solved a Monday puzzle in 00:00 minutes
  • '1 Day Streak' message should be displayed in yellow color banner.

* PDF Page Link to verify the message
Modal should be closed successfully

step.actions: Verify the streak message below the Daily puzzle tile
step.expectedresults:
• Star icon follow by You're on 1 Day Streak message should be present below the Daily tile
  • No of day(s) mentioned in the message on hub should be same as mentioned on Congrats modal message

testcase.name: Vertical Streak : Archive page UI
testcase.summary:
Verify the UI on the Archive page in Daily tab for Vertical Streaks

Tickets: 

  • https://jira.nyt.net/browse/XWD-7553
  • https://jira.nyt.net/browse/XWD-7448
testcase.preconditions:
• Subscriber user should be logged in
  • User should have at least  4 puzzles solved on Monday(or any other day) with Gold Star in a row

step.expectedresults: User should be directed to the Game Hub page
User should redirect to the Login page

step.actions: Enter email and password of the Subscriber user
step.expectedresults: Value should get entered in respective fields
User should be logged in and redirected to gamehub page
User should be successfully redirected to the Archive page

Following should be visible on Page

  • There should be a vertical line in yellow color connecting the Monday's 
  • Date should be mention netween the line connecting the two puzzles

step.actions: Click on List icon present at the Top right corner
step.expectedresults:
• Puzzles should be displayed in List view 
  • All Monday's puzzle should be displayed with Gold Star icon
Puzzle should be displayed in Grid  view
User should be redirected to the Gamehub page

• User should be redirected to the Archive page
  • Vertical between the puzzles should persist

step.actions: Verify the Streak Message on below the Daily Puzzle tile

step.actions: Solve the puzzle without using any cheat

step.actions: Verify the messages on the Congratulations modal

step.actions: Verify the streak message below the Daily puzzle tile
step.expectedresults:

  • KEEP IT GOING should be removed from the message 
  • No of day's mentioned in the message should be same as mentioned on Congrats modal message

testcase.name: Streak and Days In A Row Message UI on Hub page
testcase.summary:
Verify Streaks and Days In A Row Message UI on Hub page on Desktop and mobile browsers.

Story Ticket Ref link: 
https://jira.nyt.net/browse/XWD-7448
https://jira.nyt.net/browse/XWD-7553

Point to remember: Please note that the smallest screen size design (e.g. iPhone 5) has been adjusted. Gold star icon is removed and text is centered.
testcase.preconditions: • Subscriber is logged-in and is at Hub page with at least Streak/Days In A Row message exists on hub

step.actions: Verify streak/Days In A Row message below today's daily
step.expectedresults:
• Message should be shown with gold star icon below today's daily crossword followed by separator line and then READ ABOUT TODAY'S PUZZLE ON WORDPLAY.
  • KEEP IT GOING should be shown in next line in bold

• Message should be shown with gold star icon in front below today's daily crossword followed by separator line and then READ ABOUT TODAY'S PUZZLE ON WORDPLAY.
  • KEEP IT GOING should be shown in next line in bold

step.actions: Verify lines above and below The Mini puzzle (on mobile browser
step.expectedresults:
• Section separator line should NOT appear above and below The Mini section at hub page.
  • And below The Mini section - title should be 'Sponsored Puzzle' followed by puzzle.
  • And in non-sponsorship state, title should be Tips and Tricks followed by puzzle

testcase.name: Autocheck settings persists when user reopens the puzzle
testcase.summary: Check Autocheck settings does not persist when user checks Autocheck on opened puzzle then closes the puzzle and open again
testcase.preconditions: 1. At least one puzzle should be in Not Started/In Progress state for logged-in Subscribed user.

step.expectedresults: The Game Hub page should get open
Play page of selected puzzle should get open with 'Ready to Get Started' prompt and OK button.
Play Page should get enabled and timer should get started.
Dropdown should get open with options - Autocheck, Square, Word and Puzzle.

Below prompt should appear with NEVERMIND & USE AUTOCHECK buttons (in blue):

Using autocheck will exclude this puzzle from a streak.
Prompt should get close and timer should be running and 'Autocheck' in blue should be shown.
The Game Hub page should get open
Play page of selected puzzle should get open with 'Ready to Get Started' prompt and OK button.
Play puzzle should get enabled to play and timer should get start from where it was paused.

step.actions: Verify 'Autocheck' in Toolbar and enter a correct and incorrect letter in two diferent squares.
step.expectedresults: 'Autocheck' should be shown checked in toolbar and autocheck SHOULD  be performed on puzzle squares.

A separator line should be shown

'Ready to start solving' string should be shown below line.

Ok button should be shown in last
Game hub page should get open
Login options screen should get open

step.expectedresults: Details should get entered in respective fields
User should get logged-in successfully and Game hub page should get open

step.actions: Click The Daily Crossword and check Autocheck Modal window

Autocheck modal window should appear with following string, gif and button.

Gif: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1BP638qTeVyMU2w_blzX4-wnuuegqcGYJ6R6DJBY4oEA/edit#slide=id.p

A separator line should be shown

'Ready to start solving' string should be shown below line.

Ok button should be shown in last
Game hub page should get open
Drop down options should be shown
User should get logged out successfully
Game hub page should get open
Autocheck modal window should get open
Puzzle page should get open
Game hub page should get open
Login options screen should get open

step.actions: Enter valid email and password of subscribed user
step.expectedresults: Details should get entered in respective fields
User should get logged-in successfully and Game hub page should get open

step.actions: Click The Daily Crossword and check Autocheck Modal window
step.expectedresults:
Autocheck modal window should appear with following string, gif and button.

Message string: We’ve added Autocheck, a new feature that helps you improve your game. Turn it on in the Check menu above the puzzle.

Gif: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1BP638qTeVyMU2w_blzX4-wnuuegqcGYJ6R6DJBY4oEA/edit#slide=id.p

'Ready to start solving' string should be shown below line.

step.actions: Click on daily mini and check Autocheck modal
step.expectedresults: Autocheck modal window should NOT be shown

testcase.name: AutoCheck
testcase.summary:
A user can autocheck their answers in the game

Story Ticket: XWD-6874 , XWD-6875 , XWD-6928

Google Doc of Specs: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1TdCofC6vr_tWiDDky_q1AIqX4S3jBSgCDTSrKVycIR0/edit?ts=5b27be96#slide=id.g3c0ca41cce_0_11

step.expectedresults: The Games Hub Page appears

step.actions: Tap on the either the Daily or Mini Puzzle
step.expectedresults: User is now in the game play page

step.actions:
On Desktop:

Tap on the 'Check' button on the left

 

On Mobile:

Tap on 'Check and Reveal'
step.expectedresults: A dropdown should appear

- A modal should appear 'Using Autocheck will exclude this puzzle from a streak'

----- States that solving with this setting will not qualify for streaks and gold stars.

----- Option to not see message again

----- 'Nevermind' button

----- 'Use Autocheck'

- The dropdown closes and now the 'Autocheck' appears in an active state

- The 'Check' button no longer appears

step.actions: Tap the 'Autocheck' button to show the dropdown
step.expectedresults:
Desktop:

Verify the following appears

- Autocheck with a check mark in front of the word 

- 'Square' is inactive (greyed out)

- 'Word' is inactive (greyed out)

- 'Puzzle' is inactive (greyed out)

Mobile: (the inactive states will appear in next release)

Verify the following appears

- Autocheck with a yellow check mark in front of the word

- 'Square' is inactive (greyed out)

- 'Word' is inactive (greyed out)

- 'Puzzle' is inactive (greyed out)

Verify a check occurs on that character 

- A red slash if the character is incorrect

- No slash if the character is correct

step.actions: Enter another letter in the next square
step.expectedresults: Verify the check continues to occur

step.actions: Click on 'Autocheck' and turn off the Autocheck
step.expectedresults:
Autocheck is turned off

- All red slashes disappear
Verify no check occurs

Subscribed user should get logged-in successfully and Game Hub page should get open
Autocheck modal window should appear with message, gif and Ok button
Modal window should get closed and puzzle page should get enabled
Game hub page should get open

step.actions: Click on Monthly Bonus puzzle and check for Autocheck modal window
step.expectedresults: Autocheck modal window should NOT appear. 'Ready to get started' prompt should appear with OK button.

step.actions: Click on green icon near to Crossword label at top left to enter in  Short mode!
step.expectedresults: Page gets reload, subscribed user gets into Shortz mode
Either Autocheck modal or Ready to Get Started modal should appear

step.actions: Click Settings at left of Task bar above grid
step.expectedresults: Settings modal window should get open

step.actions: Uncheck 'Autocheck notice already seen' in Debug Settings
step.expectedresults: Autocheck notice already seen should get unchecked
'Show timer' should get unchecked
Settings modal window should get closed
Game Hub page should get open

step.actions: Click the Daily Crossword and check for Autocheck modal window

Autocheck Modal window should NOT appear.

And 'Ready to get started' prompt should also not appear.

Puzzle play page should get open directly.

testcase.name: Mini & Daily gameplay page (Automated | Chrome, Safari, Firefox)
testcase.preconditions: Open app as XWD user

step.expectedresults:
'Ready to get started?' modal appears on screen.

Verify gameboard section is inactive (greyed out a bit), clues are hidden, timer does not start

step.actions:
Dismiss modal window by clicking/tapping the 'Ok' button

Note: Clicking/tapping outside the modal, does not dismiss it
step.expectedresults:
Crossword title section contains:

- Weekday Month DD, YYYY
- Puzzle type or Name (if any)
By AUTHOR
Edited by EDITOR (if puzzle has a editor)

***  Notes (if any) with a possible 'Reveal Answer' spoiler button (if applicable)

Following items are present (left to right):

- Settings Cog;
- Timer with a pause option (if enabled);
- Rebus,

- Clear (Incomplete, Word, Puzzle, Puzzle&Timer)

- Reveal (Square, Word, Puzzle)

- Check (Autocheck, Square, Word, Puzzle)
- Pencil icon (to enter/leave pencil mode)

Following items are present:

- Cluebar 

- Grid (1 Across square is focused)

- Two question lists (Across and Down)

Verify the modal closes

testcase.name: Print / Download options (Partially automated)

step.actions: Go to www.stg.nytimes.com/crosswords and log in as a subscriber user
step.expectedresults: The Game Hub page loads

step.actions: On the top right hand corner of the daily puzzle, the print and download icon should be visible
step.expectedresults: Print and download icon appear as expected

step.actions: Scroll down and hover over the monthly puzzle
step.expectedresults: The print & download hover state appears underneath the puzzle icon

step.actions: In the 'Last 7 days' tab hover over the puzzle icon
step.expectedresults: The print and download icon appears underneath the puzzle icon and it covers the date of the puzzle

step.actions: In the 'In Progress' tab hover over the puzzle icon
step.expectedresults: The print and download icon appears underneath the puzzle icon and it covers the date of the puzzle

step.actions: Go to the Archive page and in the daily tab hover over any puzzle
step.expectedresults: The print and download icon appears underneath the puzzle icon and it covers the number of the puzzle

step.actions: Go to the 'Bonus tab' and hover over the puzzle
step.expectedresults: The print and download icon appears underneath the puzzle icon

step.actions: Go to the 'Acrostic' tab and hover over the puzzle
step.expectedresults: Only the print icon appears underneath the puzzle icon

step.actions: Go to the 'Variety' tab and hover over a couple puzzles
step.expectedresults: The print icon will appear as expected and the download icon may or may not appear for puzzles where download is not offered

Verify the Print Modal appears

Break Print into its own test case

THEN Print popup window should appear with the following attributes:
- Title "Print"
- Crossword name (e.g. 'Daily Crossword') and date (e.g. January 9, 2009)
- Puzzle / Solution/Newspaper Version Radio button
- Ink Saver slider with preview
- 'Print" button
- 'X' to close the window
Radio button should get selected.
Print preview should be open in new tab in PDF format.
Puzzle is downloaded in few seconds

testcase.name: Check Button (Automated | Chrome, Safari, Firefox)

step.actions: Go to stg.nytimes.com and click on any daily or mini puzzle
step.expectedresults: User is taken to the gameplay page

step.actions: Make some progress and click/tap on the 'Check' button
step.expectedresults:
Verify the 'Check' menu dropdown appears with the following buttons:

- Autocheck

- Check

- Word

- Puzzle

step.actions: Click/tap on the 'Square' button within the Check dropdown
step.expectedresults:
Verify the following:

- If the letter is correct, the input turns blue

- If the letter is incorrect, the red forward slash appear (grey for pencil, black for pen)

step.actions: Enter a new letter for that same square
step.expectedresults: Verify the red slash disappears

step.actions: Click/tap on the 'Word' button within the Check dropdown
step.expectedresults:
Verify the following:

- If the word/letters are correct, the input turns blue

- If the word/letters are incorrect, the red forward slash appear (grey for pencil, black for pen)

step.actions: Click/tap on the 'Puzzle' button within the Check dropdown
step.expectedresults:
Verify the following:

- If the word/letters are correct, the input turns blue

- If the word/letters are incorrect, the red forward slash appear (grey for pencil, black for pen)

testcase.name: Reveal Button (Partially automated)

step.actions: Go to stg.nytimes.com and click on any daily or mini puzzle
step.expectedresults: User is taken to the gameplay page

step.actions: Make some progress and click/tap on the 'Reveal' button
step.expectedresults:
Verify the 'Reveal' menu dropdown appears with the following buttons:

- Check

- Word

- Puzzle

step.actions: Click/tap on the 'Square' button within the Reveal dropdown
step.expectedresults:
Verify the following:

- Red flag with a circle in the center appears in the top right hand corner of the square

- The correct letter is revealed 

- The letter turns blue

step.actions: Type any letter within the revealed square
step.expectedresults: Verify the letter does not change

step.actions: Click/tap on the 'Word' button within the Reveal dropdown
step.expectedresults:
Verify the following:

- Red flag with a circle in the center appears in the top right hand corner of the square

- The correct word is revealed 

- The letter turns blue

step.actions: Click/tap on the 'Puzzle' button within the Reveal dropdown
step.expectedresults:
Verify the following:

- A warning modal appears - "Are you sure you want to reveal the puzzle?"

- 'Nevermind' button

- 'Reveal' button in blue
Verify the modal disappears and nothing on the puzzle has changed

step.actions: Click/tap on the 'Puzzle' button within the Reveal dropdown and then click on the Reveal button in the warning modal
step.expectedresults: Verify the Congrats modal appears

step.actions: Tap the X button on the Congrats modal
step.expectedresults:
Verify the following:

- Red flag with a circle in the center appears in the top right hand corner of the squares

- The puzzle is revealed 

- The letters are blue

testcase.name: Rebus mode (Automated | Chrome, Safari, Firefox)

step.expectedresults: Rebus mode is activate

step.actions: Dismiss Rebus mode. Focus on another square. Click on 'Rebus' button on toolbar
step.expectedresults: While square is in rebus mode.

step.actions: Enter a few letters. Press ENTER button
step.expectedresults: All letters appear in a single square

step.actions: Activate Rebus mode again in the same square
step.expectedresults: Cursor is placed at the end of the input

testcase.name: Modal windows (Partially automated)
testcase.preconditions: Update Modal Window Messages Link

step.expectedresults: 'Ready to get started' modal appears
'Your game has been paused.' modal appears

Modal appears:

Just so you know...

Using Reveal means this puzzle won’t count towards your streak or statistics.

Don’t warn me again - check box

CANCEL and REVEAL - buttons

Are you sure you want to erase the puzzle?

CANCEL and ERASE - buttons

Just so you know...

Resetting the timer means this puzzle won’t count towards your streak or statistics.

Don’t warn me again - check box

CANCEL and START OVER - buttons

Just so you know...

Using Check means this puzzle won’t count towards your streak or statistics.

Don’t warn me again - check box

CANCEL and CHECK - buttons

testcase.name: Default Puzzle Settings

step.expectedresults: Focus is on the leftmost top non-black square;

Focused square is populated with the typed letter;

Focus moves to the next square;

step.actions: Fill in all the letters of the current word
step.expectedresults:
Current word is populated with the typed letters;

Focus does not jump to the next word;

step.actions:
Jump to the next clue (if not jumping back) - ON

Fill in all letters of the current word
step.expectedresults:
Current word is populated with the typed letters;

Focus jumps to the next word;

testcase.name: Puzzle timer gets paused in different scenarios (Partially automated)
testcase.preconditions:
1. Subscribed user is logged-in on https://www.stg.nytimes.com/crossword.
  2. 'The Game Hub' page is opened.

step.actions: Open any puzzle from 'The Game Hub' page.
step.expectedresults: 'Ready to Get Started' prompt should appear.
Puzzle should get open to play and timer should get start.

step.actions: Make a note of timer then add a new tab in same browser, remain on this new tab for 30 seconds.
step.expectedresults: New tab will get added in browser
'Your game has been paused.' alert should be shown with 'Resume' button in blue and 'paused' text in bold.
Puzzle page should get into edit mode and timer should start from n+30 Secs, where n = time when new tab was added/opened in step #2.

step.actions: Make a note of timer and minimize the browser by clicking Minimize button of browser.
step.expectedresults: Browser will get minimize

step.actions: Wait for 30 seconds and then launch browser again.
step.expectedresults: 'Your game has been paused.' alert should be shown with 'Resume' button in blue and 'paused' text in bold.
Puzzle page should get into edit mode and timer should start from n+30 Secs, where n = time when browser was minimized in step #4.

testcase.name: Almost There Modal (Partially automated)
testcase.summary: Verify the Modal Text when user filled puzle with some incorrect data.
testcase.preconditions: 1.User should be XWD Subscriber and logged in.

step.actions: Click on Play on  Today's Puzzle/Mini puzzle
step.expectedresults: User should be redirected to game play page.

step.actions:
1.Complete the puzzle without using any life saving option.

2.Enter atleast one wrong word
step.expectedresults: On completion Almost there modal displayed on screen.

The Basic Structure should be :

  • Headline Text:
    Match text with list: 'Almost There Rotating List'
  • Body text :
    The puzzle is filled, but at least one square’s amiss. Shucks Rotating List
  • Button Text:
    Keep Trying

1. Modal should be dismissed.
  2. Puzzle should be resumed.

testcase.name: Check puzzle icon on performing reset operation on gold star achieved puzzled. (Partially automated)
testcase.preconditions:
1.User should be logged in.
2.User should be subscribe.

step.expectedresults: Games Hub page is opened
Page will redirect to the Daily puzzle.
Puzzle will appear and timer will start.
Gold star appears with Congratulations! and text "You solved a DAY OF WEEK puzzle in HH:MM:SS."
Games Hub page is opened

Page will redirect to the Daily puzzle page.
-The puzzle would be completed
-Across & down hint would be grayed out
-Timer would be stopped
The puzzle will be reset
Page will redirect to the Games Hub page.
Play' blue banner appears with Gold star.
Todays Daily puzzle will be displayed  with the gold star with play blue banner

testcase.name: Registered User:Sync 'Clear' functionality across platforms. (Partially automated)
testcase.summary: Verify when user clear the data  on web the puzzle should also get clear on mobile apps.
testcase.preconditions:
1.User should be XWD subscribe and logged in.

2. Today's puzzle is solved.

step.expectedresults: 'Ready to get started' modal should be displayed.
Puzzle play screen should be displayed.
List of clear option should be displayed.
Puzzle should get cleared.
App should be launched successfully.
user should be logged in successfully.
Opened puzzle should not contain any filled square.
